description: Meet the light, well-ventilated and durable hiking pants ready for any adventure. Designed to take on the likes of their namesake, these comfortable, hard-wearing and weather-resistant pants will have you covered. Bringing together lightweight and technical construction, with robust reinforcements where you need it most, the Zinal Hybrid Pants are a great option for three-season hiking and travel. Whether you’re enjoying a scenic family stroll, or chasing long distances in the Alps, these trousers deliver all the features you need, with five pockets, side zippers for maximum ventilation, and an adjustable hem for the perfect fit.
name: Zinal Hybrid Pants, Short - Mens

specs.value: strategically zoned fabrics for improved performance
